3.label: has Classification record number in Library of Congress Classification

a.label: has Class number in Library of Congress Classification
a.description: The class number taken from the Library of Congress classification schedules.

b.label: has Book number in Library of Congress Classification
b.description: The individual book number applied by the cataloguing agency.

2.label: has System code in Other class numbers
2.description: A code for the classification scheme used in formulating the number.

3.label: has Classification record number in Other class numbers

a.label: has Class number in Other class numbers
a.description: The class number taken from the classification scheme.

b.label: has Book number in Other class numbers
b.description: The book number applied by the assigning agency.

c.label: has Classification subdivision in Other class numbers
c.description: A subdivision of the class number taken from the classification scheme.

v.label: has Edition in Other class numbers
v.description: The number of the scheme edition used.
